name: Goldfish
description:
How to play

Click matching pairs of blue tiles to remove them.

Removing tiles allows you to see Goldfish in the background.

After all tiles are removed, the Goldfish throw sparkly gold. I think it looks cool (:

Controls

ActionEffectLeft click
Select tileRight click
Use sonarSpacebarRecreate mapFToggle fullscreenEscapeClose game

From what I understand, people have more difficulty distinguishing between shades of blue than they do with any other color. I added sonar to keep the game casual, and because it fits the theme.

Made in about 3 hours. Programmed with Game Maker Studio. Sound effects created with ChipTone by SFBGames.
